prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a fierce appearance and sharp claws.
I want a yellow Pokemon that stands out with red accents and a muscular build.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies strength and agility with a unique body shape.
Make a creature that resembles a dinosaur, showcasing both ferocity and elegance.
Imagine a dragon-like Pokemon with powerful jaws and a striking color palette.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and is known for its combat prowess.
Show me a Pokemon that has a bold and confident personality, perfect for battles.
